HomePage.title: HZZ-GC
HomePage.slogan: Not clearing memory, but recycling inspiration.
HomePage.systemOut: System.out.println("Please deposit your garbage by 12:00 PM.");
HomePage.footerDev: Developed by HZZ Garbage Collector Agent

Manifesto.title: HZZ-GC
Manifesto.subtitle: HZZ Garbage Collection (from Group Chat)
Manifesto.overviewText: HZZ-GC is the exclusive project for the HZZ group. We are a collective of tech enthusiasts, engineers, CEOs, and product managers who have transitioned from "young tech lovers" to the "middle-aged tech backbone".
Manifesto.conceptsIntro: This project strictly adopts the Garbage Collection metaphor:
Manifesto.conceptGarbageDesc: Any tool, script, demo, or prompt created by a group member.
Manifesto.conceptGarbageCriteria: Criteria: As long as it runs once, or makes the author happy for 5 minutes, it is valid Garbage.
Manifesto.conceptHeapDesc: The central area where all Garbage is allocated and displayed.
Manifesto.conceptReachabilityReachable: Reachable: Active, liked, or used Garbage.
